findings.title: [N9] Strengthen reminder
findings.description: When importing the wallet, if the mnemonic is wrong, the app will not prompt the import error, but stay in the importing.

findings.title: Lack of secure keyboard
findings.description: The app does not use a secure keyboard, mnemonics and passwords may be stolen by the keyboard when using the app.

findings.title: Lack of security reminders
findings.description: When exporting wallets, users are allowed to copy mnemonic phrases and the app lacks security reminders, which may be subject to clipboard hijacking attacks.

findings.title: Background obfuscation issue
findings.description: App UI is not obfuscated when the app is in the background. If the wallet is being exported, the mnemonic phrase may be leaked.
